import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'../style/LoginPage.css';import supabase from'./connect';import bcrypt from'bcryptjs';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginPage=_ref=>{let{isLogin}=_ref;// State variables
const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[error,setError]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();// Handle form submission
const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();// Basic validation
if(!username||!password){setError('Please enter both username and password');return;}setLoading(true);setError('');try{const{data:users,error:queryError}=await supabase.from('user').select('user_id, username, email, password').eq('username',username).limit(1);if(queryError)throw queryError;// Check if user exists
if(!users||users.length===0){setError('No account found with this username');return;}const user=users[0];// Verify password using bcrypt
const isValidPassword=await bcrypt.compare(password,user.password);if(!isValidPassword){setError('Incorrect password');return;}const userData={user_id:user.user_id,username:user.username,email:user.email};isLogin(userData);navigate('/browse');}catch(err){console.error('Login error:',err);setError('An error occurred during login');}finally{setLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-form-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"welcome-text",children:"Welcome"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"login-subtext",children:"Login to continue"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"error-message",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"error-icon",children:"\u26A0"})," ",error]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-inputs",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"Username",children:"Username"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"Username",id:"Username",placeholder:"Your Username",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),disabled:loading})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"password",children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",id:"password",placeholder:"Your password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),disabled:loading})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSubmit,className:"login-button",disabled:loading,children:loading?'Logging in...':'Login'})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"signup-text",children:["Don't have an account? ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/signup",className:"signup-link",children:"Sign up"})]})]})})});};export default LoginPage;
